en.main_subtitle: Select up to 3 apps to track your time.
en.please_select_app: Please select at least one application!
en.auto_compact: Automatically enter compact mode when tracking starts
en.reset_confirm: Reset timer and discard current session?
en.settings_saved_msg: Your settings have been saved and applied.
en.invalid_shortcut_format: Invalid format for {key} shortcut. Use format like 'ctrl+alt+e'.
en.invalid_idle_threshold_msg: Please enter a valid positive number for idle threshold.
en.invalid_check_interval_msg: Please enter a valid positive number for check interval.
en.no_history: No history data to generate stats.
en.tip_select_before: Tip 1: Select all programs you want to track before starting the timer. It is not possible to change the selection after starting.
en.tip_blank_for_all: Tip 2: You can erase the window name in the field to track the entire program, not just the selected window.
